DataElement.preferredName: Past 4 Week Reduced Productivity Physical Health Reason Yes No Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Coded indicator to signify whether a person reported having accomplished less than he/she would have liked as a result of physical health during the past four weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past 4 Week Reduced Productivity Physical Health Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4_Any period of seven consecutive days._Made less in size or amount or degree._Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit._Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Made less in size or amount or degree.:The ratio of the quantity and quality of units produced to the labor per unit of time.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
Made less in size or amount or degree.
The ratio of the quantity and quality of units produced to the labor per unit of time.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.:The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: Having substance or material existence; concerned with material things; of or pertaining to the body as distinguished from the mind or spirit.

Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
